alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Coast including Downtown Los Angeles (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 07 at 2:24AM PST until January 07 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Los Angeles County Coast including Downtown Los Angeles. * WHEN...Until 9 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Very low visibility of one quarter mile or less will create dangerous driving conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Major roadways that will be affected by dense fog include the 10, 105, 110, 405, 605, and 710 freeways as well as Pacific Coast Highway.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Coast including Downtown Los Angeles
